# Function: useBalanceOfConnectedAccount()

> **useBalanceOfConnectedAccount**(`skip`): `UseBalanceOfConnectedAccountResponse`

Defined in: [src/hooks/readContracts/useBalanceOfConnectedAccount.ts:20](https://github.com/jcam1/sdks/blob/e9f7b0b78927be622d601cd84fb3a838078d2eb3/packages/react/src/hooks/readContracts/useBalanceOfConnectedAccount.ts#L20)

Returns JPYC balance of the connected account.

## Parameters

### skip

True when this hook should be skipped, false otherwise

#### skip?

`boolean` = `false`

## Returns

`UseBalanceOfConnectedAccountResponse`

JPYC balance of the connected account (& related states)
